term.title: Poisson distribution

item.text: A discrete distribution with the differential mass-distribution function of the form: fw(x) = x/(a + 1) = e^-a.a^(x - 1)/(x - 1)! is a parameter characterizing the chain length, such as relative molecular mass or degree of polymerization and a is a positive adjustable parameter.
